languages.text: История о корабле-призраке, поглотившем души очередных жертв, еще долгие годы будет обсуждаться шепотом на всех палубах корабля Вольного Торговца.

traits.locale_text: История о корабле-призраке, поглотившем души очередных жертв, еще долгие годы будет обсуждаться шепотом на всех палубах вашего корабля.

languages.text: The story of a ghost ship that yet again has swallowed the souls of its unfortunate victims will live on for many years in hushed whispers across every deck of the Rogue Trader's voidship.
languages.original_text: История о корабле-призраке, поглотившем души очередных жертв, еще долгие годы будет обсуждаться шепотом на всех палубах корабля Вольного Торговца.

traits.locale_text: The story of a ghost ship that yet again has swallowed the souls of its unfortunate victims will live on for many years in hushed whispers aboard every deck of your voidship.
The story of a ghost ship that yet again has swallowed the souls of its unfortunate victims will live on for many years in hushed whispers across every deck of your voidship.
The story of a ghost ship that yet again has swallowed the souls of its unfortunate victims will live on for many years in hushed whispers across every deck of your voidship.
The story of a ghost ship that yet again has swallowed the souls of its unfortunate victims will live on for many years in hushed whispers across every deck of the Rogue Trader's voidship.

languages.text: 那艘幽灵船再次吞噬了不幸受害者的灵魂。在接下来的许多年里，这个故事恐怕会在你的各层甲板上悄然流传。
languages.original_text: The story of a ghost ship that yet again has swallowed the souls of its unfortunate victims will live on for many years in hushed whispers across every deck of your voidship.

traits.locale_text: 那艘幽灵船再次吞噬了不幸受害者的灵魂。在接下来的许多年里，这个故事恐怕会在你的各层甲板上悄然流传。

languages.text: またしても不幸な犠牲者の魂を飲み込んだ幽霊船の物語は、ヴォイドシップの甲板で、この先何年も語り継がれるだろう。
languages.original_text: The story of a ghost ship that yet again has swallowed the souls of its unfortunate victims will live on for many years in hushed whispers across every deck of your voidship.

traits.locale_text: またしても不幸な犠牲者の魂を飲み込んだ幽霊船の物語は、ヴォイドシップの甲板で、この先何年も語り継がれるだろう。

languages.text: La historia de una nave fantasma que, una vez más, se ha tragado las almas de sus desafortunadas víctimas perdurará durante muchos años en susurros silenciosos por todas las cubiertas de la nave del vacío.
languages.original_text: The story of a ghost ship that yet again has swallowed the souls of its unfortunate victims will live on for many years in hushed whispers across every deck of your voidship.

traits.locale_text: La historia de una nave fantasma que, una vez más, se ha tragado las almas de sus desafortunadas víctimas perdurará durante muchos años en susurros silenciosos por todas las cubiertas de la nave del vacío.

languages.text: Die Geschichte eines Geisterschiffs, die erneut die Seelen unglückseliger Opfer geschluckt hat, wird noch viele Jahre lang auf den Decks deines Raumschiffs weiterleben. Wenn auch nur im Flüsterton ...
languages.original_text: The story of a ghost ship that yet again has swallowed the souls of its unfortunate victims will live on for many years in hushed whispers across every deck of your voidship.

traits.locale_text: Die Geschichte eines Geisterschiffs, die erneut die Seelen unglückseliger Opfer geschluckt hat, wird noch viele Jahre lang auf den Decks deines Raumschiffs weiterleben. Wenn auch nur im Flüsterton ...

languages.text: La légende de ce vaisseau fantôme qui a une fois de plus englouti les âmes de ses infortunées victimes se transmettra de nombreuses années à mots couverts au sein de votre équipage.
languages.original_text: The story of a ghost ship that yet again has swallowed the souls of its unfortunate victims will live on for many years in hushed whispers across every deck of your voidship.
